content:
Mention a couple of the KPI we worked on in this conclusion statement: "The redesign of the Cita Previa website, was a challenging but enriching.

Using design thinking and market research, we identified the needs and frustrations of different user archetypes and created a more efficient and user-friendly service with inclusivity and accessibility at its core. 

The efforts have resulted in a digital-first service that streamlines the appointment booking process for all residents and citizens of Spain, improving the overall experience for users.

By analyzing the findings of similar COVID-19 booking digital apps and government websites in other countries, we were able to bring a fresh perspective and innovative features to the Cita Previa website. 

This redesign not only addresses the common pain points experienced by users, but also looks towards considerations for further improvement and the potential impact on key metrics such as potential higher conversion rates and reduced support costs.
"
